ygData.subject: we need a foothold on faydwer!
ygData.msgSnippet: at eq.stratics.com someone has started a petition to put a small city accessible to evil folk inside crushbone. this would provide us evil folk with at least
ygData.messageBody:
at eq.stratics.com someone has started a petition to put a small city
accessible to evil folk inside crushbone. this would provide us evil folk
with at least ONE safe place to bind on that entire continent, and rest up
after beating on all the goodie goodies. also, the petition asks for either
an alternate method of travelling from antonica to faydwer and back, or
making the docks in butcherblock safer. (waiting for a half hour on the dock
for the boat is more or less death to an evil person ;(). if you think any
of this is a good idea, email them at kurthau@... and let em know
you think this is a good idea, and later they will send a list of all the
people they got to verant with the intent of having this implemented. wether
it'll work or not? who knows. but at least they'll have to listen to us ;)
they cant repress evil forever you know! *rant*

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
